title: The Forecasting performance of the Factor model with Martingale Difference errors. (arXiv:2205.10256v2 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
abstract: This paper analyses the forecasting performance of a new class of factor models with martingale difference errors (FMMDE) recently introduced by Lee and Shao (2018). The FMMDE makes it possible to retrieve a transformation of the original series so that the resulting variables can be partitioned according to whether they are conditionally mean-independent with respect to past information. We contribute to the literature in two respects. First, we propose a novel methodology for selecting the number of factors in FMMDE. Through simulation experiments, we show the good performance of our approach for finite samples for various panel data specifications. Second, we compare the forecasting performance of FMMDE with alternative factor model specifications by conducting an extensive forecasting exercise using FRED-MD, a comprehensive monthly macroeconomic database for the US economy. translated_title: 带鞅差分误差的因子模型的预测性能
translated_abstract: 本文分析了由Lee和Shao（2018）最近引入的一类带鞅差分误差（FMMDE）因子模型的预测性能。FMMDE使得可以获取原系列的一个转换，以便将结果变量根据它们是否相对于过去信息条件均独立进行分区。我们在两个方面对文献做出了贡献。首先，我们提出了一种新的FMMDE因子选择方法。通过模拟实验，我们展示了我们的方法在多种面板数据规范的有限样本中的良好表现。其次，我们通过使用FRED-MD（美国经济的全面月度宏观经济数据库）进行广泛的预测练习，比较了FMMDE与替代因子模型规范的预测性能。我们的实证结果表明，FMMDE在预测实体部门的发展方面具有优势。
tldr: 本文分析了一种新型因子模型FMMDE的预测性能，并提出了一种新的因子选择方法，实验结果表明这种方法在多种面板数据规范的有限样本中表现良好。同时，通过预测练习，研究发现FMMDE在预测实体部门的发展方面具有优势。
en_tdlr: This paper analyzes the forecasting performance of a new type of factor model, FMMDE, and proposes a novel factor selection method. The simulation results show that this method performs well in various panel data specifications. Moreover, empirical findings from a forecasting exercise using FRED-MD indicate that FMMDE outperforms alternative factor model specifications in predicting the evolution of the real sector.
